short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will make you able to customize chrome new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing our awesome sports madness extension you will be utilizing the power of customizing your chrome new tab page to your liking by getting some cool wallpapers.


By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Sports Madness" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sportmadness.info/t-o-s/ and Privacy Policy at https://sportmadness.info/privacy-policy/
